channel.title: Sorted. Dont need help
channel.description:
Hi, I downloaded a semi-blank server (dont know what base)
I was trying to make custom teleports on the teletab (like 'home') And i found i did not have clicking most.java.
Were can i get one from? or get the code for one.
I have used search, but i cannot find what i am looking for. Please help..
_____________________________________________________________
Or because i dont have clickingmost.java, is there anywhere else that i edit/place the teleport information.
In some other guide i found, it said to add it to 'client.java'. i tried this and it did not work. This is what it looks like at the minute. [code] case 185: //clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId); switch(actionButtonId) { //normal magiks case 4140: //Varrock Teleport case 4143: //Lumbridge Teleport case 4146: //Falador Teleport case 4150: //Camelot Teleport case 6004: //Ardougne Teleport case 6005: //Watchtower Teleport case 29031: //Trollheim Teleport case 72038: //Ape Atoll Teleport //__________________________________ //ancient magiks case 50235: //Paddewwa Teleport case 50245: //Senntisten Teleport case 50253: //Kharyrll Teleport case 51005: //Lassar Teleport case 51013: //Dareeyak Teleport case 51023: //Carrallangar Teleport case 51031: //Annakarl Teleport case 51039: //Ghorrok Teleport //__________________________________ case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(2725, 3492, 0); break; //__________________________________[/code]
And help would be good thanks.

item.title: Sorted. Dont need help
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

Hi, I downloaded a semi-blank server (dont know what base)

I was trying to make custom teleports on the teletab (like ‘home’)
And i found i did not have clicking most.java.

Were can i get one from? or get the code for one.

I have used search, but i cannot find what i am looking for. Please help…

Or because i dont have clickingmost.java, is there anywhere else that i edit/place the teleport information.

In some other guide i found, it said to add it to ‘client.java’. i tried this and it did not work.
This is what it looks like at the minute.

case 185: //clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId); switch(actionButtonId) { //normal magiks case 4140: //Varrock Teleport case 4143: //Lumbridge Teleport case 4146: //Falador Teleport case 4150: //Camelot Teleport case 6004: //Ardougne Teleport case 6005: //Watchtower Teleport case 29031: //Trollheim Teleport case 72038: //Ape Atoll Teleport //__________________________________ //ancient magiks case 50235: //Paddewwa Teleport case 50245: //Senntisten Teleport case 50253: //Kharyrll Teleport case 51005: //Lassar Teleport case 51013: //Dareeyak Teleport case 51023: //Carrallangar Teleport case 51031: //Annakarl Teleport case 51039: //Ghorrok Teleport //__________________________________ case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(2725, 3492, 0); break; //__________________________________

And help would be good thanks.

Read full topic
